item.title: When The Data Bubble Bursts, Companies Will Have To Actually Sell Things Again
item.description:
When The Data Bubble Bursts, Companies Will Have To Actually Sell Things Again

How can a company with no revenues still make money? It's not a trick question. The answer is at the very foundation of the digital economy: advertising.

item.title: How We Trained an Algorithm to Predict What Makes a Beautiful Photo - Stories from EyeEm
item.description:
How We Trained an Algorithm to Predict What Makes a Beautiful Photo - Stories from EyeEm

EyeEm's Head of R&D explains how his team developed a deep learning technology that understands aesthetic taste and applies it to your photos. It's the core technology behind our new iOS app, .
